array.name: rules
array.item: All players, including substitution players are mandated to play only under their age group.
Each match will be of 45 minutes with 20 minutes for each half and 5 minutes of break.
The event is of league format. Thus, each team will play with each of the other team and points table will be maintained.
Each team can register with maximum of 12 players.
Only 3 substitutions will be allowed in each match. Each age group plays 7-a-side.
It is mandatory to play under the jerseys provided by SportsCult.
A copy of Aadhar card will be required to be submitted by each player as a proof of age.

array.name: about_sfl
array.item: SFL provides opportunities to hundreds of players to experience real time competitive matches every Saturday from 8th April 2017 to 20th May 2017 at a prime location in Gurugram in a brand new football field.
Exposure to higher number of real-time matches.
Best players will receive a free session with the Senior coaches at SportsCult.
Motivating rewards to the top three teams.

array.name: about_us
array.item: Founded with a Mission to ‘Make Sports a Culture’ and a belief that it’s never too early or too late to learn a sport, we deliver well-structured comprehensive programs suited for all ages and skill levels – be it amateurs, professionals or recreational and leisure. Great Quality Facilities, Standardized Training (in skill and fitness), balanced nutrition guidance and technology driven assessment process are the cornerstones of Sports Cult’s training programs.

Playing sports at any level is enjoyable and doing it regularly improves your overall personality and makes you a healthier person. Some of us take up a sport with a goal to become a champion. It is our endeavor to create a structured, scientific journey for you to reach your goal.

SportsCult is committed to excellence in all aspects of sports education that provides an inspiring environment for high performance. This commitment includes the training curriculum, well qualified trainers / coaches as well as the sporting facility.
